title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Competencies: Short-Intensive Psychology Flipped Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational psychology theories and research methods, with secondary education experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can self-directly study core psychology theories (e.g., cognitive, developmental, social psychology) via mobile micro-content and explain key concepts with over 80% accuracy.
Learners are assessed on their ability to apply psychology theories to real-world educational cases through collaborative activities with peers in face-to-face classes.
Through summative assessment, learners can design teaching strategies suitable for secondary education settings based on psychology knowledge acquired in a flipped learning environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
